snippet.title: Lost Caves Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Lost Caves at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1499190/Lost_Caves/
https://adscomics.itch.io/lost-caves
https://gamejolt.com/games/lostcaves/563412
Trapped in the depths of the earth! Young Michael Miner must find his way back to the surface, but it seems like the only way out is to get rich. Lucky for Michael, that was his plan all along...
Venture through 4 expansive levels in Lost Caves while you collect dozens of unique treasures to amass your wealth to gain access to further parts of the cave and hopefully find your way out, while also unlocking its secrets...


#platformer #indiegame
